name: utility-node-boilerplate
description: Simple NodeJS boilerplate, with basic unit test powered by Mocha/Chai/Sinon

scripts.test: npm run clean-coverage; FORCE_COLOR=true babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report text --report html _mocha -- --recursive --full-trace --es_staging --harmony --check-leaks --compilers js:babel-register -c -R spec ./test/**/*.spec.js | cat

author: Unknown Moon<unknownmoon@163.com>
